description.en:
Kosaku Shima retired from his position as chairman of Tecot, one of Japan's leading electronics manufacturers, and became an advisor to the company. He wants to contribute to Japan's economic activities
With the Tokyo Olympics approaching, he has his sights set on the world of sports. There are people who are trying to bring about a change in the old amateur sports world by bringing in a superior management vision. With the Tokyo Olympics and Paralympics in 2020 and the sports business to follow, the island is on the move.
On the other hand, inside Tecot, the criticism of the new president, Rinko Kazahana, grows stronger by the day and a suspicious letter is issued.

biography.en:
Kenshi Hirokane is a Japanese mangaka. Making use of his background as a salaried worker, he has drawn works on the theme of the lives of various adults in modern society and their conflicts. His representative work, the [Kosaku Shima](https://mangadex.org/title/79aea528-7cb7-4fbb-a65c-1271d23b7395) series was serialized for more than 30 years and became Hirokane's masterpiece. Others representative works include the [Ningen Kousaten](https://mangadex.org/title/a3d48467-0b6a-4912-8220-575b003f00bc) and [Tasogare Ryuuseigun](https://mangadex.org/title/5a9153e4-ec0d-41a8-a3f2-6d0ff4be74a4).

He is the President of Hirokane Production Co. and a visiting professor at the Department of Human Communication, Faculty of Welfare and Information Studies, Tokuyama University. He graduated from Waseda University Faculty of Law.
